sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Twitter from "../assets/icon/twitter-logo.png" import Instagram from "../assets/icon/insta-logo.png" import Snapchat from "../assets/icon/snap-logo.png" import TikTok from "../assets/icon/tiktok-logo.png" function Compte(props){ const c = { prenom:"Nasser", nom:"Nourou", photo:"https://img-4.linternaute.com/ROUIuiso_K2p5B8_xuA9GZJ41CY=/2610x/smart/41072375ec4f4bae808550106194e814/ccmcms-linternaute/10656232.jpg", displayName:"Nasser Nourou", username:"nan0u_b1nks", dateCreation:"le 3 janvier 2022", points:2352, abonnés:230, abonnement:178, status:"Morphologie de type B majuscule", resaux:[ { nom:"Instagram", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"200 €", img:Instagram }, { nom:"Tweeter", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Boutique physique et en ligne", img:Twitter }, { nom:"Snapchat", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin", img:Snapchat }, { nom:"TikTok", identifiant:"@nanou-B1nks", url:"Soumettre sa tenu avant la date de fin", img:TikTok }, ], proprietaire:true, } const compte = (
{ (c.proprietaire===true) ?

{c.displayName}

@{c.username}
{c.points} points

{c.status}

    Reseaux : {c.resaux.map(r =>
  • {r.nom} {r.identifiant}
    • )}
:

{c.displayName}

@{c.userName}
{c.points}

{c.status}

    {c.reseaux.map(r =>
  • {r.nom} {r.identifiant}
    • )}
}
) return (
{compte}
); } export default Compte;
